column5: The GYPSY room comes with a private rustic bathroom, a separate entrance from the back patio, self check-in and free unlimited WiFi! Our cool little cottage in downtown McQueeney is walking distance to the Guadalupe river, the historic and popular Blake's Restaurant, a couple of bars and the McQueeney Hall featuring country dance on Saturday night. A true country experience just 15 minutes from New Braunfels! Perfect location to set your base camp and explore the area.
